text: Clone Wars may refer to: * Star Wars: Clone Wars (2003 TV series), an American animated television series set in the Star Wars galaxy * Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008 TV series), an American 3D CGI animated television series created by Lucasfilm Animation ** Star Wars: The Clone Wars (movie), a 2008 movie * Lego Star Wars III: The Clone Wars, a 2011 video game for multiple platforms, such as Playstation 3, Xbox 360, PC, PSP and Nintendo DS. * Clone Wars (Star Wars), a series of conflicts in the fictional Star Wars universe ==Related pages== *Star Wars: Episode II â€“ Attack of the Clones, a 2002 movie
title: Clone Wars
